entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023
